main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Dashboard.Report

Class PDFGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Dashboard.Report.PDFGenerator

  • public class PDFGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to generate the PDF document of the report, to the OS Desktop.
    Since:
    2017-04-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zequn Yu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PDFGenerator(boolean total, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iGeneralR, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iTimeR, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iTimeT, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iLocalR, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iLocalT, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iElemR, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iElemT, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iMemR, javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iMemT, java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart1, java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart2, java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart3, java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart4)
      The constructor takes image parameters and generate two combined PNG files.

      To generate the PDF, default path is OS Desktop.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PDFGenerator

        public PDFGenerator(boolean total,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iGeneralR,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iTimeR,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iTimeT,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iLocalR,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iLocalT,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iElemR,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iElemT,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iMemR,
                    javafx.scene.image.WritableImage iMemT,
                    java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart1,
                    java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart2,
                    java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart3,
                    java.awt.image.BufferedImage chart4)
        The constructor takes image parameters and generate two combined PNG files.
        Parameters:
        total - if it's true then the fifth part of report is member comparison, otherwise nothing.
        iGeneralR - Image of general information of report
        iTimeR - Image of time pane of report
        iTimeT - Image of bar chart in time pane of report
        iLocalR - Image of location pane of report
        iLocalT - Image of bar chart in location pane of report
        iElemR - Image of cost element pane of report
        iElemT - Image of bar chart in cost element pane of report
        iMemR - Image of member pane of report
        iMemT - Image of bar chart in member pane of report
        chart1 - Image of table of time pane of report
        chart2 - Image of table of location pane of report
        chart3 - Image of table of cost element pane of report
        chart4 - Image of table of member pane of report

    • Method Detail

      • generatePDF

        public void generatePDF()
        To generate the PDF, default path is OS Desktop. For more information please refer to apache PDFbox reference.
